title: The Writing Menu: Ensuring Success for Every Student
description: The latest brain research about learning styles is the basis for this innovative resource by noted author and speaker Melissa Forney. The Writing Menu gives K-6 teachers a banquet of writing choices for students that stem from and enhance topics they are already studying. This resource helps you use writing to teach across the curriculum. Menu prompts on a wide variety of topics and in expository and narrative genres make teaching writing easy and fun for both you and your students. Grade-appropriate target skills provide a handy check-off to monitor students' progressâ€”and ensure accountability with state writing standards.
author: Melissa Forney
